g.text: Send job details and the public key
possibly spin up a new one
provide Job IP address, port and
This is signed with Miner's hotkey.
provide Job IP address, port and
provide Job IP address, port and
[until Client terminates the job or timeout occurs]
Send request, it can be a streamed or buffered
HTTP or a websocket. Request is signed using
Reply. Before the transmission ends, sign input/output
digest (or full value(s) in case of texts)
Send info about malicious miner, signed
with a validator (not sn12 validator) hotkey.
